dropzone.title: Drop images here, or
dropzone.formats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP up to 50MB

toast.success: {count, plural, one {# image} other {# images}} uploaded successfully
toast.noValidImages: No valid images found. Supported: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP (max 50MB)
toast.filesSkipped: {count} file(s) skipped (invalid type or too large)
toast.clipboardError: Could not access clipboard. Try using Ctrl+V while focused on the drop zone.

empty.title: No images yet
empty.description: Upload some reference images to get started

grid.confirmBulkDelete: Delete {count} selected image{count, plural, one {} other {s}}? This cannot be undone.

toast.deleted: {count, plural, one {# image} other {# images}} deleted
